name: long liner maintenance, steel | long liner maintenance, steel | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/21407/documentation

This dataset represents the maintenance of steel trawlers, per 1000 kg of light ship weight. Vessel dimensions: 28 - 38 m length.;System boundaries and relation between activities

Maintenance of vessels, including provision of all materials and work

End of life of replaced materials. Batteries are excluded, as they do not exist in the database. Long lining gear was excluded due to the minimal contribution in total vessel weight.
category: A:Agriculture, forestry and fishing/03:Fishing and aquaculture/031:Fishing/0311:Marine fishing

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Global average based on data from Spain.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Global average based on data from Spain.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: The activity is extrapolated from the respective European activity.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: A sample of 12 vessels of a population of 49 was modelled based on European geography.

exchanges.description: Maintenance of a steel long liner, per 1000 kg of light ship weight (LSW) over its lifetime. Regressions based on mainly primary data were created to relate the weight of each inventory item to a purse seiner's LSW,  adjusted for long liner's gear. The list of inventory items (granularity) contribute >95% of environmental impacts, as described in the reference publication.
